quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Elevate your inside game. A negative attitude is below the horizon...a place for lonesome hearts.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Commitment, belief and positive attitude are all important if you're going to be a success, whether you're in sports, in business or, as in my case, anthropology.
author: Donald Johanson

quote: Our daily gratitude shapes our everyday attitude.
author: H.L. Balcomb

quote: Morale and attitude are fundamentals to success.
author: Bud Wilkinson

quote: Gratitude is where every positive attitude starts.
author: Michael Hyatt,  Living Forward: A Proven Plan to Stop Drifting and Get the Life You Want

quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
author: Allen Klein

quote: Good heart, good soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Stay hungry, stay young, stay foolish, stay curious, and above all, stay humble because just when you think you got all the answers, is the moment when some bitter twist of fate in the universe will remind you that you very much don't.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: Character — the willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life — is the source from which self-respect springs.
author: Joan Didion,  On Self-Respect

quote: The more you take responsibility for your attitudes, the more you can adjust yourself in a forward thinking manner.
author: Deborah Day

quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.
author: Amy Tan

quote: Seek out that particular mental attribute which makes you feel most deeply and vitally alive, along with which comes the inner voice which says, 'This is the real me,' and when you have found that attitude, follow it.
author: William James,  The Principles of Psychology

quote: For success, attitude is often more important than education.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To feel more fulfilled your actions and activities need to be in alignment with what you deem important.
author: Deborah Day

quote: How easy to be amiable in the midst of happiness and success.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
author: Matt Cameron

quote: Strive to be value oriented rather than success oriented.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Accept yourself: flaws, quirks, talents, secret thoughts, all of it, and experience true liberation.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: My life - my personality, my habits, even my speech - is a combination of the books I choose to read, the people I choose to listen to, and the thoughts I choose to tolerate in my mind
author: Andy Andrews

quote: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
author: Roy T. Bennett,  The Light in the Heart

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Patience and persistence are the keys... The keys to unlock doors of success... With these two virtues, you grow in reasoning and experience.
author: Ogwo David Emenike

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The real things haven't changed. It is still best to be honest and truthful; to make the most of what we have; to be happy with simple pleasures; and have courage when things go wrong.
author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: Trust in your own beliefs or succumb to the influence of others’.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: If you are unclear about what attitudes you adhere to, you will have a difficult time evaluation which ones are not serving your highest good.
author: Deborah Day

quote: Self-respect permeates every aspect of your life.
author: Joe Clark

quote: Action expresses priorities.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I've had it with being nice, understanding, fair and hopeful. I feel like being negative all day. The chip on my shoulder could sink the QE2. I've got an attitude problem and nobody better get in my way...I'm in a bad mood and the whole stupid little world is gonna pay!
author: John Waters,  Crackpot: The Obsessions of John Waters

quote: If you want small changes in your life, work on your attitude. But if you want big and primary changes, work on your paradigm.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: I always say be humble but be firm. Humility and openness are the key to success without compromising your beliefs.
author: George Hickenlooper

quote: To feel the joy of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedoms—to choose one’s attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one’s own way.
author: Viktor E. Frankl,  Man's Search for Meaning

quote: Live your life, no matter what that life is.
author: Corey Taylor,  Seven Deadly Sins: Settling the Argument Between Born Bad and Damaged Good

quote: Life is about having an attitude of gratitude. And grabitude. Seriously, you’ve got to take stuff. What, do you think someone’s just going to hand you what you want?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Feel your emotions,Live true your passions,Keep still your mind.
author: Geoffrey M. Gluckman

quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Each person must live their life as a model for others.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: Don't be so humble - you are not that great.
author: Golda Meir

quote: I is for Integrity, be honest with yourself and others.
author: Lucas Remmerswaal,  The A-Z of 13 Habits: Inspired by Warren Buffett

quote: Be happy, but never satisfied.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
author: Scott Hamilton
